name: SSB Modulator
description:
This algorithm is based on one mode of the Frequency Shifter algorithm on the disting EX. It modulates two signals with each other, and produces the upper and lower sidebands on separate outputs.

If you use a pure sine wave for one of the inputs, you essentially have a frequency shifter, but one where you control the shift by controlling the frequency of your input oscillator.

parameters.name: Input1
parameters.description: The first input bus to process for the first signal.

parameters.name: Input2
parameters.description: The first input bus to process for the second signal.

parameters.name: Width
parameters.description: The number of busses to process, starting from the Input. For example, for a stereo signal, set this to 2.

parameters.name: UpperSBOutput
parameters.description: The first output bus for the upper side band.

parameters.name: LowerSBOutput
parameters.description: The first output bus for the lower side band.
